name: Forkist Web
desc: I worked with a team of five to build a website for a food finder app. I relayed HTTP requests to a backend API, designed third-party authentication, and helped implement location logs.

name: RUIn Gaming
desc: As a senior design project, my team re-modeled the RUIn progressive web application for gamers to network and schedule games. I enhanced user experience and improved site performance. For five weeks as a Project Manager, I advised design decisions and coordinated task creation, assignment and completion.

name: Computer Vision Research
desc: In a four-student research group, I created a web scraper for error/heatmap data and images from public CV algorithm datasets. I created scripts to generate correlation matrixes to analyze similarities between algorithms of interest.
